page.title: 09Questionnaire
page.content: In a questionnaire to parents of children in J3 (James Brindley School) the following answers were returned by one father: Q. What kind of TV programmes do you watch regularly? A. Plays and Films Q. Why do you enjoy TV? A. It is relaxing Q. What is your favourite TV programme? A. "Murder she wrote" Q. What sort of books do you read? A. I rarely read books Q. Do you have any hobbies? A. Yes, DIY and photography Q. Do you go to any pubs? A. Yes, "The Old Ship" which is close to work Q. Who does the gardening at your house? A. It is shared Q. Do you go to church? A. Occasionally, at Barlaston, Staffs. Q. Where do you go on holiday? A. Great Britain
